title: Japanese: language and people. - Episodes 1-5.
brief_description: A series of language videos providing an introduction to Japanese language and culture. It is arranged in units and accompanied by audio cassettes and teacher/student manuals which may be borrowed as seperate loan items. The topics are: introductions, talking about family, using the telephone, getting around, food, numbers, money and prices, colours, telling the time, days of the week and topics of general interest about Japanese culture such as food, ceremonies, music and family life. The programs also feature some of the most interesting Japanese landmarks.
